short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the right-click menu to search for selected text on odesli.co

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension for searching highlighted text on Odesli.co.
This is a tool that allows users to quickly and conveniently find information about music tracks and albums on the Odesli.com platform.

The main functionality of the program:
Select any text on the page and click on the corresponding button in the context menu to start searching for information on Odesli.co.
